message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. I'm sure we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
Your turn, Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  Consider that the value decreases for both of us as we negotiate.
Let's be reasonable.  Inflation is hitting us both hard, so a 50/50 split seems fair.  Let's end this negotiation and get our share!
